body.p: The Wine development release 1.1.41 is now available.

What's new in this release:
A wide range of Direct3D improvements.
Support for SHA-256, SHA-384, and SHA-512 algorithms.
A number of MSHTML fixes.
Support for mp3 decoding on Mac OS X.
Various widl improvements.
More typelib fixes.
OLE storage improvements.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
